channel.title: Essays on Mr. Pointing
channel.description: Recent content in Essays on Mr. Pointing

item.title: You Are Not Expected To Understand This
item.description: Modified: July 26 2024 26 short essays on the pieces/lines of code that shaped the modern understanding of computer science. 6/3/24 Halfway through, I think some of the stories are interesting. Some of the articles don’t go as deep as I think they could/should; some bring up gender/race for seemingly no reason…others actually delve deeper into the politics of it encouragingly. I started Topics I’m Interested In because of this book pretty much.
